ingredients.item: 2 large Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs
65g pointed cabbage (about 3 leaves), stalks removed and very thinly sliced
1 tsp Love Life Sesame Seeds, toasted

instructions.step: In a bowl, whisk together the stock, soy and eggs until well combined. Place the flour in a separate bowl, make a well in the centre and pour in the stock mixture. Whisk to a smooth batter, then stir in the ginger, salad onions, cabbage and carrot.
Heat half of the oil in a small (about 21cm) frying pan. Spoon in half of the mixture and cook over a medium heat until a crust starts to form around the edges and the underneath is golden and set.
Use a spatula to flip the pancake over and cook for 3 minutes more until set. Tip out onto a chopping board and repeat with the remaining mixture.
Mix together the mayonnaise and wasabi and spoon into a small bowl.
Cut each pancake into wedges and serve with the wasabi mayonnaise, toasted sesame seeds and pickled ginger alongside.
